sentence: Also scheduled to appear at the March 26 rally with Trump is former professional and college football star running back Herschel Walker, the clear front-runner in this year's GOP Senate primary in Georgia.

title: Trump returning to Georgia to campaign with David Perdue, Herschel Walker

title: Single most dangerous time: Trump blasts climate change, CRT, and KBJ

sentence: Saturdays rally in Commerce, 70 miles north-east of Atlanta and one of the most conservative parts of the state, is expected to feature Herschel Walker, a former football player running for the US Senate; Perdue; and the congressional candidate Vernon Jones, a former Democratic state representative who began calling himself the Black Donald Trump after switching parties.
author: Edward Helmore
title: Trump heads to Georgia in high-stakes bid to shape Republican primaries

sentence: Multiple Trump-endorsed candidates are scheduled to speak at Saturdays rally, including former football star and current Republican primary Senate candidate Herschel Walker and former Senator and current gubernatorial candidate David Perdue.
author: Ethan Letkeman
title: Watch Live: Donald Trump Holds Save America Rally in Commerce, Georgia

sentence: If Kemp runs, I think Herschel Walker will be seriously and negatively impacted, Trump thundered from the stage at an old racetrack in Commerce.

title: Trump brings his anti-Kemp campaign to Georgia

sentence: EXCLUSIVE: Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker racked up another impressive fundraising haul for his Senate campaign as he tries to unseat Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock of Georgia in November's midterm elections.

title: Trump-backed Herschel Walker raises $5.5M the past three months in his GOP Senate bid in Georgia

sentence: Trump talked up Perdue and former football star Herschel Walker, his pick to knock off Warnock in the general election, during a rally in Commerce, Georgia on March 26.
